remarks: The Hilbert lattice is irreducible: any element that commutes with all elements must be zero or one.  Theorem 14.8.4 of [BeltramettiCassinelli] p. 166.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
chirred $p |- ( ( A e. CH /\ A. x e. CH A C_H x ) -> ( A = 0H \/ A = ~H ) ) $.
$d A x $.
